short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A video checklist that provides pre-defined tasks that will ensure you have a well defined video for release.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The TM Video Checklist allows our internal presenters and video production experts to follow a list of pre-defined tasks to ensure a smooth and efficient process for video release.
